terms.title: 1. Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using our website and booking services, you agree to comply with these Terms. Please read them carefully before making any reservation.

list.1: By using our website and booking services, you agree to comply with these Terms & Conditions.
list.2: You must provide accurate and correct information when making any booking. Any mistake in the entered data is the user’s responsibility.
list.3: All bookings are subject to our cancellation policy, and any refunds will be processed according to the stated rules.
list.4: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms or misuse the service.
list.5: External Transactions: The website is not responsible for any financial or service-related dealings that occur outside the platform, including direct agreements with property owners or third parties.
list.6: Unsafe Areas: Users are solely responsible for bookings made in high-risk or unsafe regions. The website does not guarantee the safety of surrounding areas, and we strongly advise reviewing official travel advisories before making a booking.
list.7: Technical Issues: The website is not liable for temporary downtime, technical errors, or interruptions caused by circumstances beyond our control, such as server or internet failures.
list.8: Changes to Terms: We may update these Terms from time to time. The updated version will be published on this page with the date of the latest revision.
list.9: Governing Law: These Terms are governed by the laws of the Syrian Arab Republic, and any disputes will be resolved before the competent courts in Syria.

privacy.title: 2. Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We respect your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

list.1: Information We Collect: Account details, booking information, payment data, and technical information such as IP address and usage logs.
list.2: How We Use Data: To confirm bookings, provide support, improve services, and communicate offers or updates.
list.3: Data Sharing: We do not share your personal data with external parties except with trusted payment providers or when required by law.
list.4: Your Rights: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us.
list.5: Cookies: We use cookies to improve user experience and analyze performance. You can manage cookies through your browser settings.
list.6: Children: Our services are not directed to children under 16. We do not knowingly collect data from minors.
